Print your vouchers to use in store
To print your vouchers:

Vouchers will be accepted printed in black & white, or in colour. If you are worried your print-out might not be clear enough, try printing it out again, (vouchers can be printed more than once), or write down the 22 digit barcode number that is next to the barcode and take this in to store with your printed vouchers. If your barcode does not scan, checkout staff can type in the barcode number at the till to redeem your vouchers.
